content:
Posted: February 10, 2016
												I gave this game many chances with previous releases but every year this game disappoints with new release on so many things. The multiplayer came thinking this should be a good change to the game. But its not. Whoever is the first to pick a club in league will have a DREAM TEAM in their first 11. They just transfer anyone they want because there is no human running other clubs to refuse the offer.NO BALANCE Now I have to compete with club that has Messi, C.Ronaldo, Neymar, Iniesta, Nuer, ect. in formation while I as manager of Barcelona have some nobodies becase all of my important players got transfered before I joined. How is that a fair competition ?Not to mention the game tends to crash at random times. Match Engine simulation is a downfall, you have to watch a boring textWhat a suprise another negative rewiev on their game. I am tired of giving this a try. Next sequel that comes out won't even bother with it.

number of helpful: 23 of 34 people (68%) found this review helpful2 people found this review funny
content:
Posted: February 18, 2016
												Boot game up, check available leagues. Every leage that's waiting to start has someone whose already claimed every top player in the world in their squad. We're talking one team that resembles the FIFA Dream Team list they release each year, in every single league by virtue of having logged in first.Turn game off.There are dozens of web based soccer manager games far superior to this by simple virtue of not letting the transfer market start untill a full league is ready, or by having the NPC clubs not give away their players, or so on and so on. If you're looking for SP, just get the latest version of Football Manager, if you're looking for MP, ♥♥♥♥ it do a google search for online soccer manager, you're sure to find something better.

number of helpful: 5 of 5 people (100%) found this review helpful
content:
Posted: August 30, 2016
												Crashes alot. Only one save slot to get another you have to buy it. No FFP but spending is very limited, For example Real Madrid only starts with 25 million dollars. Only way to get alot of money without selling any of your players is to win everything and save up or through in game purchase. Transfer market is boring. A few big moves (Pogba to Bayern or Neymar to PSG) every one and a while, and no club tries to buy any of your players unless you transfer list them. Once you sign a player their contract never runs out. It is hard to develope youth players. Rivals will directly buy and sell to each other. Multiplayer is a come back one a day affair. It is best to just join a league than to form your own.Overall I had a decent time with the game. It boring after a while. I enjoyed multiplayer more than the single player. I also hate how they force you to update to Soccer Manager 2017.

content:
Posted: April 12, 2016
												All the people moaning make me laugh but also make me a bit angry - it's FREE, you ungrateful *****! Considering that fact, this is an excellent download and a very decent management game. It isn't one of those games that lure you in to make you spend real money either, that side of things is strictly optional.The game has all the correct teams/players, upgradeable stadia/facilities (can also build new stadia), basic customisable training regimens and scouts, chronological trophy cabinet and all the basics, and more, of a decent football management sim. Some transfers can be a bit unrealistic but that afflicts most management games, also you can't choose sponsors or ticket prices (I don't think).I've only played single player but for the £0.00 price, you simply cannot go wrong!Technical tip: if your timer kind of splutters and slows down on 30x setting, just double-click in the middle of the timer and it will normalise.

content:
Posted: February 24, 2016
												Soccer Manager is a fantasy soccer manager from the same company as Soccer Manager 2016 and Soccer Manager 2015.  About time they made a single version that don't change with the years. You have to like and know real life Soccer to play this game.  It worked, looked ok, plays off your Steam ID and can be used on other devices and your can use your Facebook account too.  I guess it Plays like any other fantasy sports game.  Played a top down simple view fast match and it lets you coach too.  Try it if you like like Soccer and like playing fantasy sports games.  You have a choice of playing the single player Soccer Manager 2016 and the multiplayer Soccer Manager Worlds.  The multiplayer game i don't recomend because of unfairness in the recruiting the best soccer players from the NPC managed teams, according what i read on other reviews.I don't like or playing fantasy sports games, so don't know enough besides the game runs up to starting and playing through a match on the single player mode.  This is a Quick Review.  Try it or not, i don't care.For more info:

content:
Posted: February 10, 2016
												This new updated version of Soccer Manager comes with Soccer Manager 2016 and the multiplayer Soccer Manager Worlds, all in one easy free to play package. Soccer Manager is free on Steam now and offers detailed gameplay Soccer Manager fans can love. I have experienced a few issues like hanging and slow response time on occasions but have yet to crash, so here is hoping the issues other players are experiencing are just bumpy launch bugs.

number of helpful: 7 of 18 people (39%) found this review helpful2 people found this review funny
content:
Posted: February 10, 2016
												Loving Soccer Manager Worlds, I played Soccer Manager 2015 before and loved it, played a bit of 2016 but I am now loving the new Multiplayer one, I've never been able to get into the Multiplayer ones such as the ones available on mobile but I am really enjoying this one so far as each team seems to have unique players started with them, for example I had West Ham with Peter Cech. And you are able to communicate with other managers via messaging so if you want to enquire about a player instead of just putting out a bid you can talk to them first and see what they want and do some actual business.It also has an interesting news system that shows what's happening, who's signing who and who's becoming or resigning as manager.Definitely recommend to people who like these manager games and maybe to those who play FM if they are looking for a more fast paced game with less detail but still good fun.

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: March 28
												As a huge football (soccer for American folk) fan, I naturally installed this game. I was excited to play, and while it was fun, it was rather disappointing.The single player was something like "manager mode" (if it was called like that) in FIFA and PES, except you, of course, cannot play a match as the players or see it like in FIFA or PES, and you'll have to wait a long time for it to end. It gets boring as you can't change plenty of things during the match. The multiplayer was promising at first, and I was realy "hyped" and entered as manager in 3 clubs, and I read that, as a new player, I'll have to log in and play multiplayer every day in the first week of playing the game. I thought I would be able to do so, but time has proven that it's always against me yet again, and I didn't play it 'cause I had to do other things. Guess what happened? If they don't want players to be managers in clubs and they don't play the game, they should at least do it if you don't play for a week, for example. And the log in every day in your first week policy is just stupid.4/10 Could've been a better game

Posted: March 14, 2016
												italiano - versione offlineil gioco non è male ma ci sono alcune cose che potrebbero essere migliorate;di seguito i pro ed i contro.pro:divertente;abbastanza veloce;contro:molto ma molto raramente ti arrivano offerte per giocatori che non hai messo sul mercato;la cpu è poco attiva sul mercato;non ti arrivano offerte per allenare altre squadre;alcune schermate potrebbero essere migliorate (ad esempio per vedere il potenziale di un mio giocatore devo andare nella sezione club/accademia giovanile quando potrebbe essere inserito nella scheda del giocatore);non posso inviare gli scout su un determinato calciatore;calciatori troppo simili di livello tra loro;campionato riserve/primavera simulato;le nazionali.english with google translate - offline versionthe game is not bad but there are some things that could be improved ;below the pros and cons .pro :funny;quite fast;cons :very, very rarely make you offers for players who have not put on the market ;the cpu is not very active in the market ;They do not get offers to coach other teams ;some screens could be improved ( for example, to see the potential of a player of mine I have to go in the club section / youth academy when it might be inserted in the player's card) ;I can not send scouts on a particular player ;level players too similar to each other ;league reserves / youth simulated ;national .
